data.message: Yo eminem,is this a hint that your trying to send out to fans? i know a couple stans that would stand in lines for hours just to listen to a copy of your dopeness. I hope this opens a better veiw of how i see you too if you do read this. Just know im a fan and i respect you man. Im a artist trying to get your attention while working on my own dope shit. Can’t produce worth of shit yet,but i’ll get there. See you at shady records one day.

replies.message: The "hint" is Revival is almost certain to be the album title (there has been a guerrilla campaign already in place). This is most likely the first single and will be played on SNL or the MTV EMA's in the next couple weeks.
It's thirty seconds to mars's new single guys
